definition: how old?/how big?/how much?/so big/that much
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

pinyin: Ke1 luo2 la1 duo1 da4 xia2 gu3

sentences.english: That doesn't mean these materials won't play a significant role, Wadia says.
sentences.chinese: 瓦迪亞說，這並不意味着這些材料起不了多大作用。

sentences.english: We did not find the name in the list.
sentences.chinese: 徒有其名，而沒有多大內容。

sentences.english: This will bring much business opportunities, inestimable .
sentences.chinese: 這將帶來多大商機，難以估量。

sentences.english: She pledged to complete her father’s unfinished task, whatever the cost.
sentences.chinese: 她立誓不管付出多大代價也要完成其父的未竟事業。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, a small kitchen has limited options for improvement.
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是，一個小廚房沒有多大的改進餘地。

sentences.english: How much do you need to change?
sentences.chinese: 您需要爲此做出多大改變？

sentences.english: Skinny-dipping at gunpoint did not do the South Africans much good.
sentences.chinese: 南非運動員被槍指着裸體下水也沒有多大益處。

sentences.english: How much hard disk space do I need to burn a disc?
sentences.chinese: 刻錄一張光盤需要多大的硬盤空間？

sentences.english: This foreign firm has little means .
sentences.chinese: 這家外國商行沒有多大資力。

sentences.english: No matter how old they are, they always have pursuers.
sentences.chinese: 無論她們年齡多大，總會有追求者。

sentences.english: The reporter the boy finished work, ask him how big this year?
sentences.chinese: 記者等男孩忙完活後，問他今年多大？

sentences.english: He's a real bloke - look at the size of his muscles.
sentences.chinese: 他真是個大塊頭，你看他的肌肉塊兒多大。

sentences.english: How much is it about nature versus nurture?
sentences.chinese: 與教育相比，它對性格的影響多大？

sentences.english: The proposal at the meeting to did not cause much enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 那個建議在會上來未引起多大興趣。

sentences.english: We could not measure how bad of the harmfulness caused by the noisiness.
sentences.chinese: 我們無法估量噪音會給我們造成多大的傷害。

sentences.english: You're very stu orn, but you aren't very ambitious.
sentences.chinese: 你很固執，卻沒有多大抱負。

definition: how much?/how many?/(phone number, student ID etc) what number?
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
to go to the bottom of a matter/after all/when all is said and done/(in an interrogative sentence) finally/outcome/result
it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
(before a noun) Do (you, they etc) have ...?/Is there a ...?/(before a verb) Did (you, they etc) (verb, infinitive)?/Have (you, they etc) (verb, past participle)?
